Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, three incomplete lines of an unidentified magical spell.
Curator's comments: Cf. possibly O. Deir el Médineh 1216, 3-4 (G. Posener, Catalogue des ostraca hiératiques litteraires de Deir el Médineh' II (Cairo 1956-1972), p. 29 and pl. 49-49a).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392120) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392120)
